item.title: (PI) How to disable trading for staff (PI)
item.dc:creator: @TOMBROWV TOMBROWV
item.description:
@TOMBROWV wrote:

Add this to config.java, before:public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade?

public static final boolean MOD_CAN_TRADE = false; //can mods trade?

After public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade?
add this

public static final boolean OWNER_CAN_TRADE = false; //can owners trade?

okay were but were not done.

add this into trade.java

if(c.playerRights == 1 && !Config.MOD_CAN_TRADE) { c.sendMessage("Mods cant trade"); return; } if(c.playerRights == 2 && !Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE) { c.sendMessage("Admins cant trade"); return; } if(c.playerRights == 3 && !Config.OWNER_CAN_TRADE) { c.sendMessage("Owners cant trade."); return;

i know this is basic but its helpfull

false=cant trade
true= can trade

note this is my first post (please dont flame im new)

Read full topic
item.source: (PI) How to disable trading for staff (PI)
